info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

November 17:
    1. Remove Inversion from User Image in Personal Vault Setup Modal.
    2. Replace White Box Shadow in Progress Sidebar with Border.

November 14:
    1. PDF Files in PDF Reader are not inverted.
    2. Image Viewer is Not Inverted.
    3. Some Icons are not Inverted.
